metadata.name: Heavy Stride
metadata.description:
'Heavy Stride' is an experiential moment shared with a passing American bison. Captured among the cliffs of Yellowstone this piece is a visual and sonic reflection secluded from the noise of the modern world. One minute in duration, featuring subtle shifts in light, sounds of the natural world and an original score.

'Heavy Stride' is the first NFT project from feature film writer/director Skyler Lawson.
